channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: @acookiecrumbles If you're asking me, I am not a social platform security expert. Certainly not on the scale that Twitter operates. We have to find people we trust who have been there recently.
item.source:markdown: @acookiecrumbles If you're asking me, I am not a social platform security expert. Certainly not on the scale that Twitter operates. We have to find people we trust who have been there recently.

item.description: @annamasera -- a funny thing is happening as i'm getting immersed in the world of My Brilliant Friend. In my mind I'm starting to speak words I don't know with an Italian pattern to them. I have no idea what they mean or if they mean anything, but i'm being programmed. ciao
item.source:markdown: @annamasera -- a funny thing is happening as i'm getting immersed in the world of My Brilliant Friend. In my mind I'm starting to speak words I don't know with an Italian pattern to them. I have no idea what they mean or if they mean anything, but i'm being programmed. ciao

item.title: Twitter is still OK
item.description:
We don't hate Twitter yet -- journalism is just getting started on their campaign.

Maybe there's something to the whistleblower's story, but I absolutely do not trust journalism to tell his story.

He should come to us directly not through that filter. https://t.co/jiXbRnE9VV
item.source:markdown:
We don't hate Twitter yet -- journalism is just getting started on their campaign.
Maybe there's something to the whistleblower's story, but I absolutely do not trust journalism to tell his story.
He should come to us directly not through that filter. https://t.co/jiXbRnE9VV

item.description: @Gartenberg Yesterday I updated my iPad and found they had turned it into a PC.

item.description: @benhamilton thank you. it's all USB.
item.source:markdown: @benhamilton thank you. it's all USB.

item.description: @benhamilton How does it connect to your computer?
item.source:markdown: @benhamilton How does it connect to your computer?

item.description:
@benhamilton what does it do?

no one can seem to explain its functionality.

what does it connect to and through what interfaces?

what do you plug into it?
item.source:markdown:
@benhamilton what does it do?
no one can seem to explain its functionality.
what does it connect to and through what interfaces?
what do you plug into it?

item.description: @RickyN66 @theyekid @SenatorRomney I pay taxes too. I don't mind if the government helps poor people.
item.source:markdown: @RickyN66 @theyekid @SenatorRomney I pay taxes too. I don't mind if the government helps poor people.

item.description: @SenatorRomney The difference is the Repubs take the bribes.
item.source:markdown: @SenatorRomney The difference is the Repubs take the bribes.

item.description: @__velu @siegel don't you have to think about which side of the slider you want to click in? in the checkbox there are no sides.
item.source:markdown: @__velu @siegel don't you have to think about which side of the slider you want to click in? in the checkbox there are no sides.

item.description: A friend was just telling me how great Elgato Stream Deck is but I have no idea what it actually does. https://t.co/SbSmALpvmC
item.source:markdown: A friend was just telling me how great Elgato Stream Deck is but I have no idea what it actually does. https://t.co/SbSmALpvmC

item.description:
@siegel objectively true.

checkbox: you just click.

slider:

  1. hold mouse down on slider.

  2. think about which direction you have to go.

  3. move in that direction.

  4. let up.
item.source:markdown:
@siegel objectively true.
checkbox: you just click.
slider:
1. hold mouse down on slider.
2. think about which direction you have to go.
3. move in that direction.
4. let up.

item.description: The health care system is so broken -- you have to wait for months to see a doctor, and getting some tests done is also a matter of months. In the meantime illness runs on its own schedule.
item.source:markdown: The health care system is so broken -- you have to wait for months to see a doctor, and getting some tests done is also a matter of months. In the meantime illness runs on its own schedule.

item.description:
@Gartenberg @JoannaStern I found it impossible to do messaging with Apple users when I tried to switch to an Android phone full time. They really lock you in. This is what we were supposed to be avoiding with the web, but they managed to trick is back into the silos.

Anyway now I carry both phones.
item.source:markdown:
@Gartenberg @JoannaStern I found it impossible to do messaging with Apple users when I tried to switch to an Android phone full time. They really lock you in. This is what we were supposed to be avoiding with the web, but they managed to trick is back into the silos.
Anyway now I carry both phones.
